FuncDef: This command specifies the rate allowed for the HS secondary shaper's aggregate rate and per-class rates.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum rate in kilobits per second. When the max keyword follows the rate keyword, the bandwidth limitation is removed from the aggregate or class. The max keyword is mutually exclusive to the rate parameter. Either max or a rate value must follow the rate keyword. Values-1 to 100000000, max.
